languages.text: Осколочный карабин изысканной работы. Он достаточно легок, чтобы с ним охотился великолепный ловчий небес Комморры — Бичеватель. Теперь, впрочем, он принадлежит иному владельцу.
An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.
languages.original_text: Осколочный карабин изысканной работы. Он достаточно легок, чтобы с ним охотился великолепный ловчий небес Комморры — Бичеватель. Теперь, впрочем, он принадлежит иному владельцу.

traits.locale_text: An exquisite Shardcarbine. It's light enough to be wielded by the great raptors of the Commorragh's skies — the Scourges. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.
An exquisite Shardcarbine. It's light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of the Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.
An exquisite Shardcarbine. It's light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of the Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.
An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.
An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

languages.text: 精巧なシャードカービン。コモラフの大空を駆ける猛禽スカージが振り回せるほど軽い。今はもっとふさわしい使い手の元にある。
languages.original_text: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

traits.locale_text: 精巧なシャードカービン。コモラフの大空を駆ける猛禽スカージが振り回せるほど軽い。今はもっとふさわしい使い手の元にある。

languages.text: 精致的碎片卡宾枪，重量很轻，由科摩罗空中的猛禽“天灾”使用。如今，它的主人换成了更加强大的人。
languages.original_text: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

traits.locale_text: 精致的碎片卡宾枪，重量很轻，由科摩罗空中的猛禽“天灾”使用。如今，它的主人换成了更加强大的人。

languages.text: Una exquisita carabina cristalina. Es lo suficientemente ligera para ser empuñada por las grandes rapaces de los cielos de Commorragh: los Azotes. Ahora pertenece a un portador más digno.
languages.original_text: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

traits.locale_text: Una exquisita carabina cristalina. Es lo suficientemente ligera para ser empuñada por las grandes rapaces de los cielos de Commorragh: los Azotes. Ahora pertenece a un portador más digno.

languages.text: Ein exquisiter Splitterkarabiner. Er ist so leicht, dass das große Monster am Himmel von Commorragh ihn benutzen kann, die Harpyie. Nun gehört er aber einem würdigeren Träger.
languages.original_text: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

traits.locale_text: Ein exquisiter Splitterkarabiner. Er ist so leicht, dass das große Monster am Himmel von Commorragh ihn nutzen kann, die Harpyie. Nun gehört er aber einem würdigeren Besitzer.

languages.text: Une magnifique carabine éclateuse suffisamment légère pour être maniée par le plus grand prédateur des cieux de Commorragh : le Fléau. Elle repose désormais entre des mains plus dignes.
languages.original_text: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

traits.locale_text: Une magnifique carabine éclateuse suffisamment légère pour être maniée par le plus grand prédateur des cieux de Commorragh : le Fléau. Elle repose désormais entre des mains plus dignes.

languages.text: Üst düzey bir parçakarabina. Commorragh göklerinin büyük yırtıcısı Musibet tarafından kullanılabilecek kadar hafif. Artık ona daha layık bir sahibi var.
languages.original_text: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

traits.locale_text: Üst düzey bir parçakarabina. Commorragh göklerinin büyük yırtıcısı Musibet tarafından kullanılabilecek kadar hafif. Artık ona daha layık bir sahibi var.
